name: Spectrum (itch) (sabrinacinzer)
description:
We are all one.

This video game focuses on individuals forming a union, based on the premise that we are all one. Spectrum characters are very different from each other, each with unique abilities. Despite this, they all form a unit, since their essences make the existence of visible light itself possible. This is because white light is composed of red, green and blue. Without these, white would not exist; and without white light there would be no colors. The mechanics and dynamics of the video game come from this premise, achieving an immersive experience.
